title: Fetal Bounty Hunters with Robert and Ever Carradine
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton welcome their first guests — father/daughter actors Robert and Ever Carradine! You’ll hear about being screamed at by John Wayne, Ever’s life-saving sense of fashion and design and growing up on movie sets. Plus, you’ll experience the moment, in real time, of Ever discovering that her dad wrote a song about her!
Have something interesting you’d like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
